    • Uses of GroupCondition in ch.lambdaj.group

      Subclasses of GroupCondition in ch.lambdaj.group 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ArgumentGroupCondition<T>
      A GroupCondition that allows to group items based on the value they have on a given argument
      class  StringGroupCondition
      A GroupCondition that groups items based on the values they have on the named JavaBean property
      Methods in ch.lambdaj.group that return GroupCondition 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GroupCondition GroupCondition.as(String alias)
      Sets an alias for the groups created using this condition
      <A extends Comparable<A>> 
      GroupCondition      		 GroupCondition.sort(A sortingArgument)
      Defines how the groups generated by applying this condition should be sorted based on the value assumed on the given argument by the object that is the key for a given group
